      • scanClassPath

        public static MetaJava scanClassPath(java.lang.String packageFilter)
        Scan the specified package, ignoring any errors.
        Parameters:
        packageFilter - - the package to scan
        Returns:
        a new MetaJava instance

      • scanClassPath

        public static MetaJava scanClassPath(java.lang.String packageFilter,
                                     boolean ignoreErrors)
        Main entry point for the MetaJava library. Scans a specified package based on the current system CLASSPATH and returns a new MetaJava instance.
        Parameters:
        packageFilter - - the package to scan
        ignoreErrors - - if set to false, any errors encountered while parsing class files will throw a ClassFileException
        Returns:
        a new MetaJava instance

      • where

        public MetaJava.MetaQuery where(ElementType elementType)
        Specifies what sort of elements will be tested when scanning class files.
        Parameters:
        elementType - - The ElementType
        Returns:
        - A new MetaJava.MetaQuery instance.
